objects.text: The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios. Pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of espresso.

• Premium canvas with brown accents
• SpaceWalk 3-layered sole system
• Ultra-comfortable roomy toe box

product_details.name: X Lows CORTADO
product_details.description:
- The Cortado is a study in perfect ratios.
- Like its namesake Spanish coffee, the pristine white canvas flows like steamed milk, while rich brown accents cut through with the boldness of rich, crema-topped espresso, same as a baristas pour.Bold yet smooth, the Cortado is a daily essential brewed to perfection. - Ever-soft and ever-snug grip- Roomy toe box lets our broad Indian toes breathe.- Irresistible comfort, thanks to SpaceWalk, our signature 3-layered sole system.
- SpaceWalk is light, airy, and cloud-like, and is named so for all the right reasons.
- What you'll be stepping into is a long-lasting insole placed on top of an ultra-cushioned sheet of foam found in running shoes.
- The sheet is then housed inside a light-weight rubber outsole for sturdiness, making this a go-to choice for everything from morning walks to house party nights.
- SpaceWalks grooves and textures let you land on your feet in style with zero slip and max abrasion resistance.
- Materials:Upper: Canvas with Microfiber UnderlayFootbed: Synthetic LeatherSole: Rubber, EVA

banner_details:
The banner features a balanced layout with a modern, minimalist aesthetic. On the left panel, there are multiple text elements including a bold subheading (`subheading`), a larger heading (`heading`), a brief descriptive paragraph (`description`), and a list of product features (`features`). The price is prominently displayed using a digital-style font (`price`), while a clear "SHOP NOW" call-to-action button (`cta`, `cta_background`) is presented below. The right side of the banner shows a sneaker image (`product_image`) at center stage, set against a smooth beige-to-cream gradient background with soft geometric accent shapes and curved line graphics for added motion. 

**Color Palette:**
- Cream/Soft White: `#FAF6EE` / `#F5F1E8`  
- Caramel Brown: `#A67C52`  
- Deep Mocha: `#8B5E3C`  
- Espresso Brown: `#63452A`  
- White (for CTA text): `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a stylish sneaker in a natural, earthy palette, ideal for a clean and minimalist advertisement banner. The dominant color is a warm off-white or cream (#F5F0E3), which forms the base of the shoe. Accents like the laces, eyelets, and midsole piping introduce a rich cocoa brown (#6E4B3A), adding visual depth and contrast. The star logo is white (#FFFFFF) outlined in brown for standout branding. The outsole is a deeper coffee brown (#4A3528), grounding the design. These tones are harmoniously blended, offering a natural, organic feel while each color is highlighted by its strategic placement and texture.
